title: Rosie O'Donnell's daughter arrested for child neglect, 11-month-old found near meth pipe
content: Rosie O'Donnell's 27-year-old daughter, Chelsea Belle O'Donnell, faces child neglect and drug charges after police found her 11-month-old son near meth pipe. Officers discovered her Wisconsin home in disarray and uncovered evidence of drug trafficking and meth production, including needles, meth pipes, and 18 grams of meth. Chelsea called the police over a dispute with her boyfriend but the police uncovered drug trafficking at her place.
summary: Rosie O'Donnell's 27-year-old daughter, Chelsea Belle O'Donnell, faces child neglect and drug charges after police found her 11-month-old son near meth pipe. Officers discovered her Wisconsin home in disarray and uncovered evidence of drug trafficking and meth production, including needles, meth pipes, and 18 grams of meth. Chelsea called the police over a dispute with her boyfriend but the police uncovered drug trafficking at her place.

title: Watch: Lara Trump dances to Taylor Swift's song in campaign video; Swifties call it 'cringe'
content: Swift's fans are outraged over a Trump campaign video where Lara Trump and others dance to an edited version of Taylor Swift's song '22,' repurposed to support Donald Trump. Swift has previously clarified her political stance, endorsing Kamala Harris, and condemned the misleading use of her image.After Taylor's endorsement for Harris, Donald Trump said he hates Taylor Swift.
summary: Swift's fans are outraged over a Trump campaign video where Lara Trump and others dance to an edited version of Taylor Swift's song '22,' repurposed to support Donald Trump. Swift has previously clarified her political stance, endorsing Kamala Harris, and condemned the misleading use of her image.After Taylor's endorsement for Harris, Donald Trump said he hates Taylor Swift.

title: Laura Loomer says Harris should go to therapy for grief, nobody cares for her mother
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Vice President Kamala Harris over a post about her late mother's battle with cancer. Loomer harshly commented that no one cares about Harris' grief and suggested Harris should drop out of the presidential race. Loomer is known for controversial remarks, even drawing disapproval from GOP circles and former President Donald Trump.
summary: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Vice President Kamala Harris over a post about her late mother's battle with cancer. Loomer harshly commented that no one cares about Harris' grief and suggested Harris should drop out of the presidential race. Loomer is known for controversial remarks, even drawing disapproval from GOP circles and former President Donald Trump.

title: Last few hours of singer Liam Payne's life at Buenos Aires hotel: New details emerge
content: Liam Payne's final hours in a Buenos Aires hotel before his fatal fall involved hallucinogenic drugs, alcohol, and an argument with a mystery woman. He partied with two escorts and displayed erratic behavior, smashing his laptop after an upsetting email. Police found drugs and alcohol in his chaotic room. Liam and his girlfriend Cassidy flown to Argentina to support Payne's former One Direction bandmate Niall Horan who had a concert there on October 2. But Cassidy left Argentina early though Liam begged her to stay.
summary: Liam Payne's final hours in a Buenos Aires hotel before his fatal fall involved hallucinogenic drugs, alcohol, and an argument with a mystery woman. He partied with two escorts and displayed erratic behavior, smashing his laptop after an upsetting email. Police found drugs and alcohol in his chaotic room. Liam and his girlfriend Cassidy flown to Argentina to support Payne's former One Direction bandmate Niall Horan who had a concert there on October 2. But Cassidy left Argentina early though Liam begged her to stay.

title: John Fetterman says Elon Musk is a concern for Democrats: 'Some people see him as Tony Stark'
content: ​Elon Musk has gone all out for supporting Donald Trump and will be a part of the Trump administration if the former president in back to the White House. Soon after the first assassination attempt of Donald Trump in Butler in July, Elon Musk announced his endorsement for Trump. As Donald Trump returned to Butler first time after the assassination attempt, he had Elon Musk with him and now Elon Musk is holding solo events in support of Donald Trump.
summary: ​Elon Musk has gone all out for supporting Donald Trump and will be a part of the Trump administration if the former president in back to the White House. Soon after the first assassination attempt of Donald Trump in Butler in July, Elon Musk announced his endorsement for Trump. As Donald Trump returned to Butler first time after the assassination attempt, he had Elon Musk with him and now Elon Musk is holding solo events in support of Donald Trump.

title: 81-year-old Georgia woman votes for the first time as her late husband never let her
content: At 81, Betty Cartledge cast her first vote in Georgia after her husband, who never allowed her to participate, passed away. Cartledge's newfound sense of civic duty has made her a social media sensation, with many praising her milestone and criticizing her late husband's authoritarian control. “I was so young and everything when we got married, I never really thought about it,” Cartledge said. “And then I got old, and I thought that it wouldn’t count to vote.”
summary: At 81, Betty Cartledge cast her first vote in Georgia after her husband, who never allowed her to participate, passed away. Cartledge's newfound sense of civic duty has made her a social media sensation, with many praising her milestone and criticizing her late husband's authoritarian control. “I was so young and everything when we got married, I never really thought about it,” Cartledge said. “And then I got old, and I thought that it wouldn’t count to vote.”

title: Royal Family on red alert over ominous warning from man who claimed to be King Charles' 'secret lovechild'
content: Simon Dorante-Day insists he's the love child of King Charles and Camilla, demanding a DNA test. As the Royals tour Australia, Dorante-Day plans to confront them. Royal bodyguards are on alert, monitoring individuals closely, especially anyone who makes a lot of noise in the public like Simon. He believes his facial resemblance to Charles proves his claim, emphasizing his supposed royal lineage.
summary: Simon Dorante-Day insists he's the love child of King Charles and Camilla, demanding a DNA test. As the Royals tour Australia, Dorante-Day plans to confront them. Royal bodyguards are on alert, monitoring individuals closely, especially anyone who makes a lot of noise in the public like Simon. He believes his facial resemblance to Charles proves his claim, emphasizing his supposed royal lineage.

title: Delta flight asks Marine Corps veteran to change her 'threatening' t-shirt or get down
content: “I feel like they just took my soul away. I’m not a bad person, and that T-shirt, I should be allowed to support myself and veterans,” Marines Corps veteran Catherine Banks said as she was asked to get off a Delta flight because her T-shirt had the word 'suicide' in it.
summary: “I feel like they just took my soul away. I’m not a bad person, and that T-shirt, I should be allowed to support myself and veterans,” Marines Corps veteran Catherine Banks said as she was asked to get off a Delta flight because her T-shirt had the word 'suicide' in it.

title: 'We are going to ... ': Watch what Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu said after drone from Lebanon targets his home
content: A Lebanese drone targeted Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence, prompting him to reaffirm Israel's stance against Iran-backed militants. Netanyahu highlighted the recent killing of terrorist leader Yahya Sinwar by the IDF and emphasized their commitment to victory. Meanwhile, Hezbollah escalated the conflict with rocket attacks on northern Israel, including areas near Haifa and Safed.
summary: A Lebanese drone targeted Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence, prompting him to reaffirm Israel's stance against Iran-backed militants. Netanyahu highlighted the recent killing of terrorist leader Yahya Sinwar by the IDF and emphasized their commitment to victory. Meanwhile, Hezbollah escalated the conflict with rocket attacks on northern Israel, including areas near Haifa and Safed.

title: Man arrested after firebombing Japan’s ruling party headquarters, crashing car into PM's residence
content: A 49-year-old man, Atsunobu Usuda, launched firebombs at Japan's ruling LDP headquarters in Tokyo and crashed into the Prime Minister's residence fence. He was arrested, with motives possibly linked to financial frustrations over public office candidacy. The LDP faces declining support amid financial controversies ahead of upcoming elections.
summary: A 49-year-old man, Atsunobu Usuda, launched firebombs at Japan's ruling LDP headquarters in Tokyo and crashed into the Prime Minister's residence fence. He was arrested, with motives possibly linked to financial frustrations over public office candidacy. The LDP faces declining support amid financial controversies ahead of upcoming elections.

title: 'Will not halt Axis of Resistance': Iran reacts to Hamas leader Sinwar's death
content: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Khamenei, extends condolences on the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, emphasizing that Hamas will persevere. Despite Sinwar’s death, Khamenei reassures Iran's unwavering support for the Palestinian resistance, highlighting the resilience of the resistance front against Israel.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Khamenei, extends condolences on the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, emphasizing that Hamas will persevere. Despite Sinwar’s death, Khamenei reassures Iran's unwavering support for the Palestinian resistance, highlighting the resilience of the resistance front against Israel.

title: Elon Musk 'cant stop laughing' over The Atlantic's Trump-Hitler comparison
content: Billionaire Elon Musk mocked an article by The Atlantic, which compared Donald Trump's rhetoric to that of dictators Hitler, Stalin, and Mussolini. The article cites Trump's use of terms like 'vermin' and 'poisoning the blood' to illustrate his polarizing language. This sparked debate online about the media's portrayal of Trump and its impact on public discourse.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk mocked an article by The Atlantic, which compared Donald Trump's rhetoric to that of dictators Hitler, Stalin, and Mussolini. The article cites Trump's use of terms like 'vermin' and 'poisoning the blood' to illustrate his polarizing language. This sparked debate online about the media's portrayal of Trump and its impact on public discourse.

title: Watch: Israeli tank striking Yahya Sinwar's Gaza shelter before conducting ground raid
content: The Israel Defense Forces released footage of an operation that resulted in the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, who orchestrated the October 7 attacks on Israel. Sinwar was targeted in a building by tank fire. Israel confirmed his death through forensic tests. Prime Minister Netanyahu declared this a significant blow to Hamas, but stated the conflict in Gaza continues.
summary: The Israel Defense Forces released footage of an operation that resulted in the death of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, who orchestrated the October 7 attacks on Israel. Sinwar was targeted in a building by tank fire. Israel confirmed his death through forensic tests. Prime Minister Netanyahu declared this a significant blow to Hamas, but stated the conflict in Gaza continues.

title: Chinese drone manufacturer DJI sues Pentagon over blacklisting
content: Drone manufacturer DJI filed a lawsuit against the US department of defense, challenging its designation as a 'Chinese military company.' DJI claims it produces consumer and commercial drones, and is not controlled by the Chinese military. The lawsuit follows Washington's increased scrutiny of Chinese tech companies over national security concerns.
summary: Drone manufacturer DJI filed a lawsuit against the US department of defense, challenging its designation as a 'Chinese military company.' DJI claims it produces consumer and commercial drones, and is not controlled by the Chinese military. The lawsuit follows Washington's increased scrutiny of Chinese tech companies over national security concerns.

title: Who is Kate Cassidy? Liam's girlfriend pens heartfelt note
content: Kate Cassidy, Liam Payne's girlfriend, paid tribute to him following his passing on October 17. Liam, a former One Direction member, died after falling from a hotel balcony in Argentina. The One Direction band and Cassidy expressed their grief, urging for privacy. Payne's behaviour before the incident suggested intoxication, according to police reports.
summary: Kate Cassidy, Liam Payne's girlfriend, paid tribute to him following his passing on October 17. Liam, a former One Direction member, died after falling from a hotel balcony in Argentina. The One Direction band and Cassidy expressed their grief, urging for privacy. Payne's behaviour before the incident suggested intoxication, according to police reports.

title: Cuba blackout: Millions plunged into darkness after power plant failure
content: Cuba faces a nationwide blackout after the Antonio Guiteras thermoelectric plant ceased operations, triggering a total grid failure. Millions remain without power as officials scramble to restart plants. Emergency measures include school closures. The crisis exacerbates existing shortages of food, fuel, water, and medicine.
summary: Cuba faces a nationwide blackout after the Antonio Guiteras thermoelectric plant ceased operations, triggering a total grid failure. Millions remain without power as officials scramble to restart plants. Emergency measures include school closures. The crisis exacerbates existing shortages of food, fuel, water, and medicine.

title: 'Trump sales tax': Obama warns US people of Trump's big economic plan
content: Former US President Barack Obama criticized Donald Trump's economic policies during a speech in Arizona, attributing early successes of Trump's economy to his own administration's groundwork. Obama described Trump's tariff strategies as harmful and claimed that financial missteps, including tax cuts, led to instability, sparking mixed reactions on social media.
summary: Former US President Barack Obama criticized Donald Trump's economic policies during a speech in Arizona, attributing early successes of Trump's economy to his own administration's groundwork. Obama described Trump's tariff strategies as harmful and claimed that financial missteps, including tax cuts, led to instability, sparking mixed reactions on social media.

title: 'America is ready to turn the page': Obama throws weight behind Harris as election enters final stretch
content: Former President Obama campaigned for Kamala Harris in Tucson, criticizing Donald Trump for sowing division. Obama questioned Trump's competence and mental state, citing his bizarre public appearances. He called for unity and urged the crowd to support Kamala Harris, expressing optimism for America's future. Obama emphasized the need to turn the page on Trump's presidency.
summary: Former President Obama campaigned for Kamala Harris in Tucson, criticizing Donald Trump for sowing division. Obama questioned Trump's competence and mental state, citing his bizarre public appearances. He called for unity and urged the crowd to support Kamala Harris, expressing optimism for America's future. Obama emphasized the need to turn the page on Trump's presidency.
